name: playwright-ts-automation
description: Playwright TypeScript + Cucumber automation framework for UI, API, and Accessibility testing

scripts.clean: rm -rf reports/cucumber-report-* reports/cucumber-report.json package-lock.json node_modules || true
scripts.test:ui: cucumber-js --tags '@ui' && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:api: cucumber-js --tags '@api' && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:accessibility: cucumber-js --tags '@accessibility' && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:dev: ENV=dev cucumber-js && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:qa: ENV=qa cucumber-js && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:ui:dev: ENV=dev cucumber-js --tags '@ui' && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:ui:qa: ENV=qa cucumber-js --tags '@ui' && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:api:dev: ENV=dev cucumber-js --tags '@api' && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:api:qa: ENV=qa cucumber-js --tags '@api' && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:accessibility:dev: ENV=dev cucumber-js --tags '@accessibility' && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:accessibility:qa: ENV=qa cucumber-js --tags '@accessibility' && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.test:pact:parallel: PARALLEL=4 cucumber-js --tags '@pact and @parallel' && npm run report
scripts.test:pact:parallel:dev: ENV=dev PARALLEL=4 cucumber-js --tags '@pact and @parallel' && npm run report
scripts.test:pact:parallel:qa: ENV=qa PARALLEL=4 cucumber-js --tags '@pact and @parallel' && npm run report
scripts.test:api:allure: rm -rf allure-results && cucumber-js --tags '@api' --format json:allure-results/cucumber-report.json --format 'allure-cucumberjs/reporter:allure-results' && npx allure serve allure-results
